questions.quote: Y'know what? I can't believe this! Do you know what you did? My girlfriend is out there thinking things over! You made my girlfriend think!!
Are you sure? Because I can stay out as late as you want. I told you how I'm on sabbatical from work, right?
Hey Rach, what time do you get off? We're all gonna do something tonight.
Well I'm not sure yet, but umm of the top of my head I'm thinking double sided tape and some sort of luncheon meat.
I like this girl, okay, I seriously like this girl, you now how sometimes I tend get a little defended and quipy...
Everybody, this is Paolo. Paolo, I want you to meet my friends. This is Monica.
You know, I mean, you can't tell your parents you were fired because they'd be disappointed.
Oh, honey, I forgot. I promised Treeger that we'd leave our keys.
Didn't it drive you crazy to have a switch and not know what it did?
Y'know, he won't even talk to me. How am I going to apologize to him if he won't even talk to me?
